504  public function __construct($db)
505  {
506  $this->db = $db;
507  $this->canvas = '';
508  }
509 
515  public function check()
516  {
517  $this->ref = dol_sanitizeFileName(stripslashes($this->ref));
518 
519  $err = 0;
520  if (dol_strlen(trim($this->ref)) == 0) {
521  $err++;
522  }
523 
524  if (dol_strlen(trim($this->label)) == 0) {
525  $err++;
526  }
527 
528  if ($err > 0) {
529  return 0;
530  } else {
531  return 1;
532  }
533  }
534 
542  public function create($user, $notrigger = 0)
543  {
544  global $conf, $langs;
545 
546  $error = 0;
547 
548  // Clean parameters
549  $this->ref = dol_sanitizeFileName(dol_string_nospecial(trim($this->ref)));
550  $this->label = trim($this->label);
551  $this->price_ttc = price2num($this->price_ttc);
552  $this->price = price2num($this->price);
553  $this->price_min_ttc = price2num($this->price_min_ttc);
554  $this->price_min = price2num($this->price_min);
555  if (empty($this->tva_tx)) {
556  $this->tva_tx = 0;
557  }
558  if (empty($this->tva_npr)) {
559  $this->tva_npr = 0;
560  }
561  //Local taxes
562  if (empty($this->localtax1_tx)) {
563  $this->localtax1_tx = 0;
564  }
565  if (empty($this->localtax2_tx)) {
566  $this->localtax2_tx = 0;
567  }
568  if (empty($this->localtax1_type)) {
569  $this->localtax1_type = '0';
570  }
571  if (empty($this->localtax2_type)) {
572  $this->localtax2_type = '0';
573  }
574  if (empty($this->price)) {
575  $this->price = 0;
576  }
577  if (empty($this->price_min)) {
578  $this->price_min = 0;
579  }
580  // Price by quantity
581  if (empty($this->price_by_qty)) {
582  $this->price_by_qty = 0;
583  }
584 
585  if (empty($this->status)) {
586  $this->status = 0;
587  }
588  if (empty($this->status_buy)) {
589  $this->status_buy = 0;
590  }
591 
592  $price_ht = 0;
593  $price_ttc = 0;
594  $price_min_ht = 0;
595  $price_min_ttc = 0;
596 
597  //
598  if ($this->price_base_type == 'TTC' && $this->price_ttc > 0) {
599  $price_ttc = price2num($this->price_ttc, 'MU');
600  $price_ht = price2num($this->price_ttc / (1 + ($this->tva_tx / 100)), 'MU');
601  }
602 
603  //
604  if ($this->price_base_type != 'TTC' && $this->price > 0) {
605  $price_ht = price2num($this->price, 'MU');
606  $price_ttc = price2num($this->price * (1 + ($this->tva_tx / 100)), 'MU');
607  }
608 
609  //
610  if (($this->price_min_ttc > 0) && ($this->price_base_type == 'TTC')) {
611  $price_min_ttc = price2num($this->price_min_ttc, 'MU');
612  $price_min_ht = price2num($this->price_min_ttc / (1 + ($this->tva_tx / 100)), 'MU');
613  }
614 
615  //
616  if (($this->price_min > 0) && ($this->price_base_type != 'TTC')) {
617  $price_min_ht = price2num($this->price_min, 'MU');
618  $price_min_ttc = price2num($this->price_min * (1 + ($this->tva_tx / 100)), 'MU');
619  }
620 
621  $this->accountancy_code_buy = trim($this->accountancy_code_buy);
622  $this->accountancy_code_buy_intra = trim($this->accountancy_code_buy_intra);
623  $this->accountancy_code_buy_export = trim($this->accountancy_code_buy_export);
624  $this->accountancy_code_sell = trim($this->accountancy_code_sell);
625  $this->accountancy_code_sell_intra = trim($this->accountancy_code_sell_intra);
626  $this->accountancy_code_sell_export = trim($this->accountancy_code_sell_export);
627 
628  // Barcode value
629  $this->barcode = trim($this->barcode);
630 
631  // Check parameters
632  if (empty($this->label)) {
633  $this->error = 'ErrorMandatoryParametersNotProvided';
634  return -1;
635  }
636 
637  if (empty($this->ref) || $this->ref == 'auto') {
638  // Load object modCodeProduct
639  $module = (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_CODEPRODUCT_ADDON) ? $conf->global->PRODUCT_CODEPRODUCT_ADDON : 'mod_codeproduct_leopard');
640  if ($module != 'mod_codeproduct_leopard') { // Do not load module file for leopard
641  if (substr($module, 0, 16) == 'mod_codeproduct_' && substr($module, -3) == 'php') {
642  $module = substr($module, 0, dol_strlen($module) - 4);
643  }
644  dol_include_once('/core/modules/product/'.$module.'.php');
645  $modCodeProduct = new $module;
646  if (!empty($modCodeProduct->code_auto)) {
647  $this->ref = $modCodeProduct->getNextValue($this, $this->type);
648  }
649  unset($modCodeProduct);
650  }
651 
652  if (empty($this->ref)) {
653  $this->error = 'ProductModuleNotSetupForAutoRef';
654  return -2;
655  }
656  }
657 
658  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::create ref=".$this->ref." price=".$this->price." price_ttc=".$this->price_ttc." tva_tx=".$this->tva_tx." price_base_type=".$this->price_base_type, LOG_DEBUG);
659 
660  $now = dol_now();
661 
662  $this->db->begin();
663 
664  // For automatic creation during create action (not used by Dolibarr GUI, can be used by scripts)
665  if ($this->barcode == -1) {
666  $this->barcode = $this->get_barcode($this, $this->barcode_type_code);
667  }
668 
669  // Check more parameters
670  // If error, this->errors[] is filled
671  $result = $this->verify();
672 
673  if ($result >= 0) {
674  $sql = "SELECT count(*) as nb";
675  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product";
676  $sql .= " WHERE entity IN (".getEntity('product').")";
677  $sql .= " AND ref = '".$this->db->escape($this->ref)."'";
678 
679  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
680  if ($result) {
681  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
682  if ($obj->nb == 0) {
683  // Produit non deja existant
684  $sql = "INSERT INTO ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product (";
685  $sql .= "datec";
686  $sql .= ", entity";
687  $sql .= ", ref";
688  $sql .= ", ref_ext";
689  $sql .= ", price_min";
690  $sql .= ", price_min_ttc";
691  $sql .= ", label";
692  $sql .= ", fk_user_author";
693  $sql .= ", fk_product_type";
694  $sql .= ", price";
695  $sql .= ", price_ttc";
696  $sql .= ", price_base_type";
697  $sql .= ", tobuy";
698  $sql .= ", tosell";
699  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_PRODUCT_PERENTITY_SHARED)) {
700  $sql .= ", accountancy_code_buy";
701  $sql .= ", accountancy_code_buy_intra";
702  $sql .= ", accountancy_code_buy_export";
703  $sql .= ", accountancy_code_sell";
704  $sql .= ", accountancy_code_sell_intra";
705  $sql .= ", accountancy_code_sell_export";
706  }
707  $sql .= ", canvas";
708  $sql .= ", finished";
709  $sql .= ", tobatch";
710  $sql .= ", batch_mask";
711  $sql .= ", fk_unit";
712  $sql .= ") VALUES (";
713  $sql .= "'".$this->db->idate($now)."'";
714  $sql .= ", ".$conf->entity;
715  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($this->ref)."'";
716  $sql .= ", ".(!empty($this->ref_ext) ? "'".$this->db->escape($this->ref_ext)."'" : "null");
717  $sql .= ", ".price2num($price_min_ht);
718  $sql .= ", ".price2num($price_min_ttc);
719  $sql .= ", ".(!empty($this->label) ? "'".$this->db->escape($this->label)."'" : "null");
720  $sql .= ", ".$user->id;
721  $sql .= ", ".$this->type;
722  $sql .= ", ".price2num($price_ht);
723  $sql .= ", ".price2num($price_ttc);
724  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($this->price_base_type)."'";
725  $sql .= ", ".$this->status;
726  $sql .= ", ".$this->status_buy;
727  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_PRODUCT_PERENTITY_SHARED)) {
728  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_buy)."'";
729  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_buy_intra)."'";
730  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_buy_export)."'";
731  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_sell)."'";
732  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_sell_intra)."'";
733  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_sell_export)."'";
734  }
735  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($this->canvas)."'";
736  $sql .= ", ".((!isset($this->finished) || $this->finished < 0 || $this->finished == '') ? 'null' : (int) $this->finished);
737  $sql .= ", ".((empty($this->status_batch) || $this->status_batch < 0) ? '0' : $this->status_batch);
738  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($this->batch_mask)."'";
739  $sql .= ", ".(!$this->fk_unit ? 'NULL' : $this->fk_unit);
740  $sql .= ")";
741 
742  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::Create", LOG_DEBUG);
743  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
744  if ($result) {
745  $id = $this->db->last_insert_id(MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product");
746 
747  if ($id > 0) {
748  $this->id = $id;
749  $this->price = $price_ht;
750  $this->price_ttc = $price_ttc;
751  $this->price_min = $price_min_ht;
752  $this->price_min_ttc = $price_min_ttc;
753 
754  $result = $this->_log_price($user);
755  if ($result > 0) {
756  if ($this->update($id, $user, true, 'add') <= 0) {
757  $error++;
758  }
759  } else {
760  $error++;
761  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
762  }
763 
764  // update accountancy for this entity
765  if (!$error && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_PRODUCT_PERENTITY_SHARED)) {
766  $this->db->query("DELETE FROM " . MAIN_DB_PREFIX . "product_perentity WHERE fk_product = " .((int) $this->id) . " AND entity = " . ((int) $conf->entity));
767 
768  $sql = "INSERT INTO " . MAIN_DB_PREFIX . "product_perentity (";
769  $sql .= " fk_product";
770  $sql .= ", entity";
771  $sql .= ", accountancy_code_buy";
772  $sql .= ", accountancy_code_buy_intra";
773  $sql .= ", accountancy_code_buy_export";
774  $sql .= ", accountancy_code_sell";
775  $sql .= ", accountancy_code_sell_intra";
776  $sql .= ", accountancy_code_sell_export";
777  $sql .= ") VALUES (";
778  $sql .= $this->id;
779  $sql .= ", " . $conf->entity;
780  $sql .= ", '" . $this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_buy) . "'";
781  $sql .= ", '" . $this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_buy_intra) . "'";
782  $sql .= ", '" . $this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_buy_export) . "'";
783  $sql .= ", '" . $this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_sell) . "'";
784  $sql .= ", '" . $this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_sell_intra) . "'";
785  $sql .= ", '" . $this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_sell_export) . "'";
786  $sql .= ")";
787  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
788  if (!$result) {
789  $error++;
790  $this->error = 'ErrorFailedToInsertAccountancyForEntity';
791  }
792  }
793  } else {
794  $error++;
795  $this->error = 'ErrorFailedToGetInsertedId';
796  }
797  } else {
798  $error++;
799  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
800  }
801  } else {
802  // Product already exists with this ref
803  $langs->load("products");
804  $error++;
805  $this->error = "ErrorProductAlreadyExists";
806  }
807  } else {
808  $error++;
809  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
810  }
811 
812  if (!$error && !$notrigger) {
813  // Call trigger
814  $result = $this->call_trigger('PRODUCT_CREATE', $user);
815  if ($result < 0) {
816  $error++;
817  }
818  // End call triggers
819  }
820 
821  if (!$error) {
822  $this->db->commit();
823  return $this->id;
824  } else {
825  $this->db->rollback();
826  return -$error;
827  }
828  } else {
829  $this->db->rollback();
830  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::Create fails verify ".join(',', $this->errors), LOG_WARNING);
831  return -3;
832  }
833  }
834 
835 
842  public function verify()
843  {
844  $this->errors = array();
845 
846  $result = 0;
847  $this->ref = trim($this->ref);
848 
849  if (!$this->ref) {
850  $this->errors[] = 'ErrorBadRef';
851  $result = -2;
852  }
853 
854  $rescode = $this->check_barcode($this->barcode, $this->barcode_type_code);
855  if ($rescode) {
856  if ($rescode == -1) {
857  $this->errors[] = 'ErrorBadBarCodeSyntax';
858  } elseif ($rescode == -2) {
859  $this->errors[] = 'ErrorBarCodeRequired';
860  } elseif ($rescode == -3) {
861  // Note: Common usage is to have barcode unique. For variants, we should have a different barcode.
862  $this->errors[] = 'ErrorBarCodeAlreadyUsed';
863  }
864 
865  $result = -3;
866  }
867 
868  return $result;
869  }
870 
871  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
882  public function check_barcode($valuetotest, $typefortest)
883  {
884  // phpcs:enable
885  global $conf;
886  if (!empty($conf->barcode->enabled) && !empty($conf->global->BARCODE_PRODUCT_ADDON_NUM)) {
887  $module = strtolower($conf->global->BARCODE_PRODUCT_ADDON_NUM);
888 
889  $dirsociete = array_merge(array('/core/modules/barcode/'), $conf->modules_parts['barcode']);
890  foreach ($dirsociete as $dirroot) {
891  $res = dol_include_once($dirroot.$module.'.php');
892  if ($res) {
893  break;
894  }
895  }
896 
897  $mod = new $module();
898 
899  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::check_barcode value=".$valuetotest." type=".$typefortest." module=".$module);
900  $result = $mod->verif($this->db, $valuetotest, $this, 0, $typefortest);
901  return $result;
902  } else {
903  return 0;
904  }
905  }

918  public function update($id, $user, $notrigger = false, $action = 'update', $updatetype = false)
919  {
920  global $langs, $conf, $hookmanager;
921 
922  $error = 0;
923 
924  // Check parameters
925  if (!$this->label) {
926  $this->label = 'MISSING LABEL';
927  }
928 
929  // Clean parameters
930  $this->ref = dol_string_nospecial(trim($this->ref));
931  $this->label = trim($this->label);
932  $this->description = trim($this->description);
933  $this->note = (isset($this->note) ? trim($this->note) : null);
934  $this->net_measure = price2num($this->net_measure);
935  $this->net_measure_units = trim($this->net_measure_units);
936  $this->weight = price2num($this->weight);
937  $this->weight_units = trim($this->weight_units);
938  $this->length = price2num($this->length);
939  $this->length_units = trim($this->length_units);
940  $this->width = price2num($this->width);
941  $this->width_units = trim($this->width_units);
942  $this->height = price2num($this->height);
943  $this->height_units = trim($this->height_units);
944  $this->surface = price2num($this->surface);
945  $this->surface_units = trim($this->surface_units);
946  $this->volume = price2num($this->volume);
947  $this->volume_units = trim($this->volume_units);
948 
949  // set unit not defined
950  if (is_numeric($this->length_units)) {
951  $this->width_units = $this->length_units; // Not used yet
952  }
953  if (is_numeric($this->length_units)) {
954  $this->height_units = $this->length_units; // Not used yet
955  }
956 
957  // Automated compute surface and volume if not filled
958  if (empty($this->surface) && !empty($this->length) && !empty($this->width) && $this->length_units == $this->width_units) {
959  $this->surface = $this->length * $this->width;
960  $this->surface_units = measuring_units_squared($this->length_units);
961  }
962  if (empty($this->volume) && !empty($this->surface) && !empty($this->height) && $this->length_units == $this->height_units) {
963  $this->volume = $this->surface * $this->height;
964  $this->volume_units = measuring_units_cubed($this->height_units);
965  }
966 
967  if (empty($this->tva_tx)) {
968  $this->tva_tx = 0;
969  }
970  if (empty($this->tva_npr)) {
971  $this->tva_npr = 0;
972  }
973  if (empty($this->localtax1_tx)) {
974  $this->localtax1_tx = 0;
975  }
976  if (empty($this->localtax2_tx)) {
977  $this->localtax2_tx = 0;
978  }
979  if (empty($this->localtax1_type)) {
980  $this->localtax1_type = '0';
981  }
982  if (empty($this->localtax2_type)) {
983  $this->localtax2_type = '0';
984  }
985  if (empty($this->status)) {
986  $this->status = 0;
987  }
988  if (empty($this->status_buy)) {
989  $this->status_buy = 0;
990  }
991 
992  if (empty($this->country_id)) {
993  $this->country_id = 0;
994  }
995 
996  if (empty($this->state_id)) {
997  $this->state_id = 0;
998  }
999 
1000  // Barcode value
1001  $this->barcode = trim($this->barcode);
1002 
1003  $this->accountancy_code_buy = trim($this->accountancy_code_buy);
1004  $this->accountancy_code_buy_intra = trim($this->accountancy_code_buy_intra);
1005  $this->accountancy_code_buy_export = trim($this->accountancy_code_buy_export);
1006  $this->accountancy_code_sell = trim($this->accountancy_code_sell);
1007  $this->accountancy_code_sell_intra = trim($this->accountancy_code_sell_intra);
1008  $this->accountancy_code_sell_export = trim($this->accountancy_code_sell_export);
1009 
1010 
1011  $this->db->begin();
1012 
1013  $result = 0;
1014  // Check name is required and codes are ok or unique. If error, this->errors[] is filled
1015  if ($action != 'add') {
1016  $result = $this->verify(); // We don't check when update called during a create because verify was already done
1017  } else {
1018  // we can continue
1019  $result = 0;
1020  }
1021 
1022  if ($result >= 0) {
1023  if (empty($this->oldcopy)) {
1024  $org = new self($this->db);
1025  $org->fetch($this->id);
1026  $this->oldcopy = $org;
1027  }
1028 
1029  // Test if batch management is activated on existing product
1030  // If yes, we create missing entries into product_batch
1031  if ($this->hasbatch() && !$this->oldcopy->hasbatch()) {
1032  //$valueforundefinedlot = 'Undefined'; // In previous version, 39 and lower
1033  $valueforundefinedlot = '000000';
1034  if (!empty($conf->global->STOCK_DEFAULT_BATCH)) {
1035  $valueforundefinedlot = $conf->global->STOCK_DEFAULT_BATCH;
1036  }
1037 
1038  dol_syslog("Flag batch of product id=".$this->id." is set to ON, so we will create missing records into product_batch");
1039 
1040  $this->load_stock();
1041  foreach ($this->stock_warehouse as $idW => $ObjW) { // For each warehouse where we have stocks defined for this product (for each lines in product_stock)
1042  $qty_batch = 0;
1043  foreach ($ObjW->detail_batch as $detail) { // Each lines of detail in product_batch of the current $ObjW = product_stock
1044  if ($detail->batch == $valueforundefinedlot || $detail->batch == 'Undefined') {
1045  // We discard this line, we will create it later
1046  $sqlclean = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_batch WHERE batch in('Undefined', '".$this->db->escape($valueforundefinedlot)."') AND fk_product_stock = ".((int) $ObjW->id);
1047  $result = $this->db->query($sqlclean);
1048  if (!$result) {
1049  dol_print_error($this->db);
1050  exit;
1051  }
1052  continue;
1053  }
1054 
1055  $qty_batch += $detail->qty;
1056  }
1057  // Quantities in batch details are not same as stock quantity,
1058  // so we add a default batch record to complete and get same qty in parent and child table
1059  if ($ObjW->real <> $qty_batch) {
1060  $ObjBatch = new Productbatch($this->db);
1061  $ObjBatch->batch = $valueforundefinedlot;
1062  $ObjBatch->qty = ($ObjW->real - $qty_batch);
1063  $ObjBatch->fk_product_stock = $ObjW->id;
1064 
1065  if ($ObjBatch->create($user, 1) < 0) {
1066  $error++;
1067  $this->errors = $ObjBatch->errors;
1068  }
1069  }
1070  }
1071  }

1078  $sql = "UPDATE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product";

1093  $sql .= ", localtax2_type = ".($this->localtax2_type != '' ? "'".$this->db->escape($this->localtax2_type)."'" : "'0'");

1146

1148

1150  if ($resql) {

1152 
1153  // Multilangs
1154  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_MULTILANGS)) {
1155  if ($this->setMultiLangs($user) < 0) {
1156  $this->error = $langs->trans("Error")." : ".$this->db->error()." - ".$sql;
1157  return -2;
1158  }
1159  }
1160 
1161  $action = 'update';
1162 
1163  // update accountancy for this entity
1164  if (!$error && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_PRODUCT_PERENTITY_SHARED)) {
1165  $this->db->query("DELETE FROM " . MAIN_DB_PREFIX . "product_perentity WHERE fk_product = " . ((int) $this->id) . " AND entity = " . ((int) $conf->entity));
1166

1175  $sql .= ", accountancy_code_sell_export";
1176  $sql .= ") VALUES (";
1177  $sql .= $this->id;
1178  $sql .= ", " . $conf->entity;
1179  $sql .= ", '" . $this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_buy) . "'";
1180  $sql .= ", '" . $this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_buy_intra) . "'";
1181  $sql .= ", '" . $this->db->escape($this->accountancy_code_buy_export) . "'";

1188  $error++;
1189  $this->error = 'ErrorFailedToUpdateAccountancyForEntity';
1190  }
1191  }

1194  if (!$error) {

1196  if ($result < 0) {
1197  $error++;
1198  }
1199  }
1200 
1201  if (!$error && !$notrigger) {
1202  // Call trigger
1203  $result = $this->call_trigger('PRODUCT_MODIFY', $user);
1204  if ($result < 0) {
1205  $error++;
1206  }
1207  // End call triggers
1208  }
1209 
1210  if (!$error && (is_object($this->oldcopy) && $this->oldcopy->ref !== $this->ref)) {
1211  // We remove directory
1212  if ($conf->product->dir_output) {
1213  $olddir = $conf->product->dir_output."/".dol_sanitizeFileName($this->oldcopy->ref);
1214  $newdir = $conf->product->dir_output."/".dol_sanitizeFileName($this->ref);
1215  if (file_exists($olddir)) {
1216  //include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT . '/core/lib/files.lib.php';
1217  //$res = dol_move($olddir, $newdir);
1218  // do not use dol_move with directory
1219  $res = @rename($olddir, $newdir);
1220  if (!$res) {
1221  $langs->load("errors");
1222  $this->error = $langs->trans('ErrorFailToRenameDir', $olddir, $newdir);
1223  $error++;
1224  }
1225  }
1226  }
1227  }
1228 
1229  if (!$error) {
1230  if (!empty($conf->variants->enabled)) {
1231  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/variants/class/ProductCombination.class.php';
1232 
1233  $comb = new ProductCombination($this->db);
1234 
1235  foreach ($comb->fetchAllByFkProductParent($this->id) as $currcomb) {
1236  $currcomb->updateProperties($this, $user);
1237  }
1238  }
1239 
1240  $this->db->commit();
1241  return 1;
1242  } else {
1243  $this->db->rollback();
1244  return -$error;
1245  }
1246  } else {
1247  if ($this->db->errno() == 'DB_ERROR_RECORD_ALREADY_EXISTS') {
1248  $langs->load("errors");
1249  if (empty($conf->barcode->enabled) || empty($this->barcode)) {
1250  $this->error = $langs->trans("Error")." : ".$langs->trans("ErrorProductAlreadyExists", $this->ref);
1251  } else {
1252  $this->error = $langs->trans("Error")." : ".$langs->trans("ErrorProductBarCodeAlreadyExists", $this->barcode);
1253  }
1254  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
1255  $this->db->rollback();
1256  return -1;
1257  } else {
1258  $this->error = $langs->trans("Error")." : ".$this->db->error()." - ".$sql;
1259  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
1260  $this->db->rollback();
1261  return -2;
1262  }
1263  }
1264  } else {
1265  $this->db->rollback();
1266  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::Update fails verify ".join(',', $this->errors), LOG_WARNING);
1267  return -3;
1268  }
1269  }

1278  public function delete(User $user, $notrigger = 0)
1279  {
1280  global $conf, $langs;
1281  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/files.lib.php';
1282 
1283  $error = 0;
1284 
1285  // Check parameters
1286  if (empty($this->id)) {
1287  $this->error = "Object must be fetched before calling delete";
1288  return -1;
1289  }
1290  if (($this->type == Product::TYPE_PRODUCT && empty($user->rights->produit->supprimer)) || ($this->type == Product::TYPE_SERVICE && empty($user->rights->service->supprimer))) {
1291  $this->error = "ErrorForbidden";
1292  return 0;
1293  }
1294 
1295  $objectisused = $this->isObjectUsed($this->id);
1296  if (empty($objectisused)) {
1297  $this->db->begin();
1298 
1299  if (!$error && empty($notrigger)) {
1300  // Call trigger
1301  $result = $this->call_trigger('PRODUCT_DELETE', $user);
1302  if ($result < 0) {
1303  $error++;
1304  }
1305  // End call triggers
1306  }
1307 
1308  // Delete from product_batch on product delete
1309  if (!$error) {
1310  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'product_batch';
1311  $sql .= " WHERE fk_product_stock IN (";
1312  $sql .= "SELECT rowid FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'product_stock';
1313  $sql .= " WHERE fk_product = ".((int) $this->id).")";
1314 
1315  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
1316  if (!$result) {
1317  $error++;
1318  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
1319  }
1320  }
1321 
1322  // Delete all child tables
1323  if (!$error) {
1324  $elements = array('product_fournisseur_price', 'product_price', 'product_lang', 'categorie_product', 'product_stock', 'product_customer_price', 'product_lot'); // product_batch is done before
1325  foreach ($elements as $table) {
1326  if (!$error) {
1327  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$table;
1328  $sql .= " WHERE fk_product = ".(int) $this->id;
1329 
1330  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
1331  if (!$result) {
1332  $error++;
1333  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
1334  }
1335  }
1336  }
1337  }
1338 
1339  if (!$error) {
1340  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/variants/class/ProductCombination.class.php';
1341  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/variants/class/ProductCombination2ValuePair.class.php';
1342 
1343  //If it is a parent product, then we remove the association with child products
1344  $prodcomb = new ProductCombination($this->db);
1345 
1346  if ($prodcomb->deleteByFkProductParent($user, $this->id) < 0) {
1347  $error++;
1348  $this->errors[] = 'Error deleting combinations';
1349  }
1350 
1351  //We also check if it is a child product
1352  if (!$error && ($prodcomb->fetchByFkProductChild($this->id) > 0) && ($prodcomb->delete($user) < 0)) {
1353  $error++;
1354  $this->errors[] = 'Error deleting child combination';
1355  }
1356  }
1357 
1358  // Delete from product_association
1359  if (!$error) {
1360  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_association";
1361  $sql .= " WHERE fk_product_pere = ".(int) $this->id." OR fk_product_fils = ".(int) $this->id;
1362 
1363  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
1364  if (!$result) {
1365  $error++;
1366  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
1367  }
1368  }
1369 
1370  // Remove extrafields
1371  if (!$error) {
1372  $result = $this->deleteExtraFields();
1373  if ($result < 0) {
1374  $error++;
1375  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::delete error -4 ".$this->error, LOG_ERR);
1376  }
1377  }
1378 
1379  // Delete product
1380  if (!$error) {
1381  $sqlz = "DELETE FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product";
1382  $sqlz .= " WHERE rowid = ".(int) $this->id;
1383 
1384  $resultz = $this->db->query($sqlz);
1385  if (!$resultz) {
1386  $error++;
1387  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
1388  }
1389  }
1390 
1391  if (!$error) {
1392  // We remove directory
1393  $ref = dol_sanitizeFileName($this->ref);
1394  if ($conf->product->dir_output) {
1395  $dir = $conf->product->dir_output."/".$ref;
1396  if (file_exists($dir)) {
1397  $res = @dol_delete_dir_recursive($dir);
1398  if (!$res) {
1399  $this->errors[] = 'ErrorFailToDeleteDir';
1400  $error++;
1401  }
1402  }
1403  }
1404  }
1405 
1406  if (!$error) {
1407  $this->db->commit();
1408  return 1;
1409  } else {
1410  foreach ($this->errors as $errmsg) {
1411  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::delete ".$errmsg, LOG_ERR);
1412  $this->error .= ($this->error ? ', '.$errmsg : $errmsg);
1413  }
1414  $this->db->rollback();
1415  return -$error;
1416  }
1417  } else {
1418  $this->error = "ErrorRecordIsUsedCantDelete";
1419  return 0;
1420  }
1421  }

1497  $sql2 .= ", note";

1517  }

1522  if ($result < 0) {
1523  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
1524  return -1;
1525  }
1526  // End call triggers

("'".$this->db->escape($this->default_vat_code)."'") : "null").", ".((int) $this->tva_npr).",";

((int) $this->fk_price_expression) : 'null');
1718  $sql .= ")";
1719 
1720  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::_log_price", LOG_DEBUG);
1721  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);

1727  return 1;

1768  public function getSellPrice($thirdparty_seller, $thirdparty_buyer, $pqp = 0)
1769  {
1770  global $conf, $db;
1771 
1772  // Update if prices fields are defined
1773  $tva_tx = get_default_tva($thirdparty_seller, $thirdparty_buyer, $this->id);
1774  $tva_npr = get_default_npr($thirdparty_seller, $thirdparty_buyer, $this->id);
1775  if (empty($tva_tx)) {
1776  $tva_npr = 0;
1777  }
1778 
1779  $pu_ht = $this->price;
1780  $pu_ttc = $this->price_ttc;
1781  $price_min = $this->price_min;
1782  $price_base_type = $this->price_base_type;
1783 
1784  // If price per segment
1785  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_MULTIPRICES) && !empty($thirdparty_buyer->price_level)) {
1786  $pu_ht = $this->multiprices[$thirdparty_buyer->price_level];
1787  $pu_ttc = $this->multiprices_ttc[$thirdparty_buyer->price_level];
1788  $price_min = $this->multiprices_min[$thirdparty_buyer->price_level];
1789  $price_base_type = $this->multiprices_base_type[$thirdparty_buyer->price_level];
1790  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_MULTIPRICES_USE_VAT_PER_LEVEL)) { // using this option is a bug. kept for backward compatibility
1791  if (isset($this->multiprices_tva_tx[$thirdparty_buyer->price_level])) {
1792  $tva_tx = $this->multiprices_tva_tx[$thirdparty_buyer->price_level];
1793  }
1794  if (isset($this->multiprices_recuperableonly[$thirdparty_buyer->price_level])) {
1795  $tva_npr = $this->multiprices_recuperableonly[$thirdparty_buyer->price_level];
1796  }
1797  if (empty($tva_tx)) {
1798  $tva_npr = 0;
1799  }
1800  }
1801  } elseif (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES)) {
1802  // If price per customer
1803  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/class/productcustomerprice.class.php';
1804 
1805  $prodcustprice = new Productcustomerprice($this->db);
1806 
1807  $filter = array('t.fk_product' => $this->id, 't.fk_soc' => $thirdparty_buyer->id);
1808 
1809  $result = $prodcustprice->fetch_all('', '', 0, 0, $filter);
1810  if ($result) {
1811  if (count($prodcustprice->lines) > 0) {
1812  $pu_ht = price($prodcustprice->lines[0]->price);
1813  $price_min = price($prodcustprice->lines[0]->price_min);
1814  $pu_ttc = price($prodcustprice->lines[0]->price_ttc);
1815  $price_base_type = $prodcustprice->lines[0]->price_base_type;
1816  $tva_tx = $prodcustprice->lines[0]->tva_tx;
1817  if ($prodcustprice->lines[0]->default_vat_code && !preg_match('/\(.*\)/', $tva_tx)) {
1818  $tva_tx .= ' ('.$prodcustprice->lines[0]->default_vat_code.')';
1819  }
1820  $tva_npr = $prodcustprice->lines[0]->recuperableonly;
1821  if (empty($tva_tx)) {
1822  $tva_npr = 0;
1823  }
1824  }
1825  }
1826  } elseif (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY)) {
1827  // If price per quantity
1828  if ($this->prices_by_qty[0]) {
1829  // yes, this product has some prices per quantity
1830  // Search price into product_price_by_qty from $this->id
1831  foreach ($this->prices_by_qty_list[0] as $priceforthequantityarray) {
1832  if ($priceforthequantityarray['rowid'] != $pqp) {
1833  continue;
1834  }
1835  // We found the price
1836  if ($priceforthequantityarray['price_base_type'] == 'HT') {
1837  $pu_ht = $priceforthequantityarray['unitprice'];
1838  } else {
1839  $pu_ttc = $priceforthequantityarray['unitprice'];
1840  }
1841  break;
1842  }
1843  }
1844  } elseif (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY_MULTIPRICES)) {
1845  // If price per quantity and customer
1846  if ($this->prices_by_qty[$thirdparty_buyer->price_level]) {
1847  // yes, this product has some prices per quantity
1848  // Search price into product_price_by_qty from $this->id
1849  foreach ($this->prices_by_qty_list[$thirdparty_buyer->price_level] as $priceforthequantityarray) {
1850  if ($priceforthequantityarray['rowid'] != $pqp) {
1851  continue;
1852  }
1853  // We found the price
1854  if ($priceforthequantityarray['price_base_type'] == 'HT') {
1855  $pu_ht = $priceforthequantityarray['unitprice'];
1856  } else {
1857  $pu_ttc = $priceforthequantityarray['unitprice'];
1858  }
1859  break;
1860  }
1861  }
1862  }
1863 
1864  return array('pu_ht'=>$pu_ht, 'pu_ttc'=>$pu_ttc, 'price_min'=>$price_min, 'price_base_type'=>$price_base_type, 'tva_tx'=>$tva_tx, 'tva_npr'=>$tva_npr);
1865  }

1867  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
1881  public function get_buyprice($prodfournprice, $qty, $product_id = 0, $fourn_ref = '', $fk_soc = 0)
1882  {
1883  // phpcs:enable
1884  global $conf;
1885  $result = 0;
1886 
1887  // We do a first seach with a select by searching with couple prodfournprice and qty only (later we will search on triplet qty/product_id/fourn_ref)
1888  $sql = "SELECT pfp.rowid, pfp.price as price, pfp.quantity as quantity, pfp.remise_percent,";
1889  $sql .= " pfp.fk_product, pfp.ref_fourn, pfp.desc_fourn, pfp.fk_soc, pfp.tva_tx, pfp.fk_supplier_price_expression,";
1890  $sql .= " pfp.default_vat_code,";
1891  $sql .= " pfp.multicurrency_price, pfp.multicurrency_unitprice, pfp.multicurrency_tx, pfp.fk_multicurrency, pfp.multicurrency_code";
1892  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_SUPPLIER_PACKAGING)) {
1893  $sql .= ", pfp.packaging";
1894  }
1895  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_fournisseur_price as pfp";
1896  $sql .= " WHERE pfp.rowid = ".((int) $prodfournprice);
1897  if ($qty > 0) {
1898  $sql .= " AND pfp.quantity <= ".((float) $qty);
1899  }
1900  $sql .= " ORDER BY pfp.quantity DESC";
1901 
1902  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::get_buyprice first search by prodfournprice/qty", LOG_DEBUG);
1903  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
1904  if ($resql) {
1905  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
1906  if ($obj && $obj->quantity > 0) { // If we found a supplier prices from the id of supplier price
1907  if (!empty($conf->dynamicprices->enabled) && !empty($obj->fk_supplier_price_expression)) {
1908  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/dynamic_price/class/price_parser.class.php';
1909  $prod_supplier = new ProductFournisseur($this->db);
1910  $prod_supplier->product_fourn_price_id = $obj->rowid;
1911  $prod_supplier->id = $obj->fk_product;
1912  $prod_supplier->fourn_qty = $obj->quantity;

1944  $sql = "SELECT pfp.rowid, pfp.price as price, pfp.quantity as quantity, pfp.remise_percent, pfp.fk_soc,";

1960  $sql .= " ORDER BY pfp.quantity DESC";
1961  $sql .= " LIMIT 1";
1962 
1963  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::get_buyprice second search from qty/ref/product_id", LOG_DEBUG);
1964  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
1965  if ($resql) {
1966  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);

1972  $prod_supplier->id = $obj->fk_product;
1973  $prod_supplier->fourn_qty = $obj->quantity;

1985  $this->fourn_pu = $obj->price / $obj->quantity; // Unit price of product for a virtual supplier
1986  $this->fourn_price_base_type = 'HT'; // Price base type for a virtual supplier
1987  $this->fourn_socid = $obj->fk_soc; // Company that offer this price
1988  $this->ref_fourn = $obj->ref_supplier; // deprecated
1989  $this->ref_supplier = $obj->ref_supplier; // Ref supplier

1996  $this->fourn_multicurrency_tx = $obj->multicurrency_tx;
1997  $this->fourn_multicurrency_id = $obj->fk_multicurrency;
1998  $this->fourn_multicurrency_code = $obj->multicurrency_code;

2001  }
2002  $result = $obj->fk_product;
2003  return $result;
2004  } else {
2005  return -1; // Ce produit n'existe pas avec cet id tarif fournisseur ou existe mais qte insuffisante, ni pour le couple produit/ref fournisseur dans la quantité.
2006  }
2007  } else {
2008  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
2009  return -3;
2010  }
2011  }
2012  } else {
2013  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
2014  return -2;

2035  public function updatePrice($newprice, $newpricebase, $user, $newvat = '', $newminprice = 0, $level = 0, $newnpr = 0, $newpbq = 0, $ignore_autogen = 0, $localtaxes_array = array(), $newdefaultvatcode = '')
2036  {
2037  global $conf, $langs;
2038 
2039  $lastPriceData = $this->getArrayForPriceCompare($level); // temporary store current price before update
2040 
2041  $id = $this->id;
2042 
2043  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_price id=".$id." newprice=".$newprice." newpricebase=".$newpricebase." newminprice=".$newminprice." level=".$level." npr=".$newnpr." newdefaultvatcode=".$newdefaultvatcode);

2046  if (empty($this->tva_tx)) {

2048  }
2049  if (empty($newnpr)) {
2050  $newnpr = 0;
2051  }
2052  if (empty($newminprice)) {
2053  $newminprice = 0;
2054  }
2055  if (empty($newminprice)) {
2056  $newminprice = 0;
2057  }
2058 
2059  // Check parameters
2060  if ($newvat == '') {
2061  $newvat = $this->tva_tx;
2062  }
2063 
2064  // If multiprices are enabled, then we check if the current product is subject to price autogeneration
2065  // Price will be modified ONLY when the first one is the one that is being modified
2066  if ((!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_MULTIPRICES) || !empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY_MULTIPRICES)) && !$ignore_autogen && $this->price_autogen && ($level == 1)) {
2067  return $this->generateMultiprices($user, $newprice, $newpricebase, $newvat, $newnpr, $newpbq);
2068  }
2069 
2070  if (!empty($newminprice) && ($newminprice > $newprice)) {
2071  $this->error = 'ErrorPriceCantBeLowerThanMinPrice';

2073  }

2076  if ($newpricebase == 'TTC') {
2077  $price_ttc = price2num($newprice, 'MU');
2078  $price = price2num($newprice) / (1 + ($newvat / 100));
2079  $price = price2num($price, 'MU');
2080 
2081  if ($newminprice != '' || $newminprice == 0) {
2082  $price_min_ttc = price2num($newminprice, 'MU');
2083  $price_min = price2num($newminprice) / (1 + ($newvat / 100));
2084  $price_min = price2num($price_min, 'MU');
2085  } else {
2086  $price_min = 0;
2087  $price_min_ttc = 0;
2088  }
2089  } else {
2090  $price = price2num($newprice, 'MU');
2091  $price_ttc = ($newnpr != 1) ? price2num($newprice) * (1 + ($newvat / 100)) : $price;
2092  $price_ttc = price2num($price_ttc, 'MU');
2093 
2094  if ($newminprice !== '' || $newminprice === 0) {
2095  $price_min = price2num($newminprice, 'MU');
2096  $price_min_ttc = price2num($newminprice) * (1 + ($newvat / 100));
2097  $price_min_ttc = price2num($price_min_ttc, 'MU');
2098  //print 'X'.$newminprice.'-'.$price_min;
2099  } else {
2100  $price_min = 0;
2101  $price_min_ttc = 0;
2102  }
2103  }
2104  //print 'x'.$id.'-'.$newprice.'-'.$newpricebase.'-'.$price.'-'.$price_ttc.'-'.$price_min.'-'.$price_min_ttc;
2105 
2106  if (count($localtaxes_array) > 0) {
2107  $localtaxtype1 = $localtaxes_array['0'];
2108  $localtax1 = $localtaxes_array['1'];
2109  $localtaxtype2 = $localtaxes_array['2'];

2123  }

2126

2130  $sql .= " price_base_type='".$this->db->escape($newpricebase)."',";
2131  $sql .= " price=".$price.",";

2139  $sql .= " default_vat_code=".($newdefaultvatcode ? "'".$this->db->escape($newdefaultvatcode)."'" : "null").",";

2143

2145  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
2146  if ($resql) {

2148  $this->multiprices_ttc[$level] = $price_ttc;
2149  $this->multiprices_min[$level] = $price_min;
2150  $this->multiprices_min_ttc[$level] = $price_min_ttc;
2151  $this->multiprices_base_type[$level] = $newpricebase;
2152  $this->multiprices_default_vat_code[$level] = $newdefaultvatcode;
2153  $this->multiprices_tva_tx[$level] = $newvat;
2154  $this->multiprices_recuperableonly[$level] = $newnpr;
2155 
2156  $this->price = $price;
2157  $this->price_ttc = $price_ttc;
2158  $this->price_min = $price_min;
2159  $this->price_min_ttc = $price_min_ttc;
2160  $this->price_base_type = $newpricebase;
2161  $this->default_vat_code = $newdefaultvatcode;
2162  $this->tva_tx = $newvat;
2163  $this->tva_npr = $newnpr;
2164  //Local taxes
2165  $this->localtax1_tx = $localtax1;
2166  $this->localtax2_tx = $localtax2;
2167  $this->localtax1_type = $localtaxtype1;
2168  $this->localtax2_type = $localtaxtype2;
2169 
2170  // Price by quantity
2171  $this->price_by_qty = $newpbq;
2172 
2173  // check if price have really change before log
2174  $newPriceData = $this->getArrayForPriceCompare($level);
2175  if (!empty(array_diff_assoc($newPriceData, $lastPriceData)) || empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_MULTIPRICES)) {
2176  $this->_log_price($user, $level); // Save price for level into table product_price
2177  }
2178 
2179  $this->level = $level; // Store level of price edited for trigger
2180 
2181  // Call trigger
2182  $result = $this->call_trigger('PRODUCT_PRICE_MODIFY', $user);
2183  if ($result < 0) {
2184  $this->db->rollback();
2185  return -1;
2186  }
2187  // End call triggers
2188 
2189  $this->db->commit();
2190  } else {
2191  $this->db->rollback();
2192  dol_print_error($this->db);
2193  }
2194  }
2195 
2196  return 1;
2197  }

2625  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
2632  public function load_stats_mo($socid = 0)
2633  {
2634  // phpcs:enable
2635  global $user, $hookmanager, $action;
2636 
2637  $error = 0;
2638 
2639  foreach (array('toconsume', 'consumed', 'toproduce', 'produced') as $role) {
2640  $this->stats_mo['customers_'.$role] = 0;
2641  $this->stats_mo['nb_'.$role] = 0;
2642  $this->stats_mo['qty_'.$role] = 0;
2643 
2644  $sql = "SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.fk_soc) as nb_customers, COUNT(DISTINCT c.rowid) as nb,";
2645  $sql .= " SUM(mp.qty) as qty";
2646  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."mrp_mo as c";
2647  $sql .= " INNER JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."mrp_production as mp ON mp.fk_mo=c.rowid";
2648  if (empty($user->rights->societe->client->voir) && !$socid) {
2649  $sql .= "INNER JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe_commerciaux as sc ON sc.fk_soc=c.fk_soc AND sc.fk_user = ".((int) $user->id);
2650  }
2651  $sql .= " WHERE ";
2652  $sql .= " c.entity IN (".getEntity('mo').")";
2653 
2654  $sql .= " AND mp.fk_product = ".((int) $this->id);
2655  $sql .= " AND mp.role ='".$this->db->escape($role)."'";
2656  if ($socid > 0) {
2657  $sql .= " AND c.fk_soc = ".((int) $socid);
2658  }
2659 
2660  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
2661  if ($result) {
2662  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
2663  $this->stats_mo['customers_'.$role] = $obj->nb_customers ? $obj->nb_customers : 0;
2664  $this->stats_mo['nb_'.$role] = $obj->nb ? $obj->nb : 0;
2665  $this->stats_mo['qty_'.$role] = $obj->qty ? price2num($obj->qty, 'MS') : 0; // qty may be a float due to the SUM()
2666  } else {
2667  $this->error = $this->db->error();
2668  $error++;
2669  }
2670  }
2671 
2672  if (!empty($error)) {
2673  return -1;
2674  }
2675 
2676  $parameters = array('socid' => $socid);
2677  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('loadStatsCustomerMO', $parameters, $this, $action);
2678  if ($reshook > 0) {
2679  $this->stats_mo = $hookmanager->resArray['stats_mo'];
2680  }
2681 
2682  return 1;
2683  }

2692  public function load_stats_bom($socid = 0)
2693  {
2694  // phpcs:enable
2695  global $user, $hookmanager;
2696 
2697  $error = 0;
2698 
2699  $this->stats_bom['nb_toproduce'] = 0;
2700  $this->stats_bom['nb_toconsume'] = 0;
2701  $this->stats_bom['qty_toproduce'] = 0;
2702  $this->stats_bom['qty_toconsume'] = 0;
2703 
2704  $sql = "SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT b.rowid) as nb_toproduce,";
2705  $sql .= " SUM(b.qty) as qty_toproduce";
2706  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."bom_bom as b";
2707  $sql .= " INNER JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."bom_bomline as bl ON bl.fk_bom=b.rowid";

2710  $sql .= " AND b.fk_product =".((int) $this->id);
2711  $sql .= " GROUP BY b.rowid";

2714  if ($result) {

2716  $this->stats_bom['nb_toproduce'] = !empty($obj->nb_toproduce) ? $obj->nb_toproduce : 0;
2717  $this->stats_bom['qty_toproduce'] = !empty($obj->qty_toproduce) ? price2num($obj->qty_toproduce) : 0;
2718  } else {

2720  $error++;
2721  }
2722

2725  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."bom_bom as b";
2726  $sql .= " INNER JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."bom_bomline as bl ON bl.fk_bom=b.rowid";
2727  $sql .= " WHERE ";
2728  $sql .= " b.entity IN (".getEntity('bom').")";
2729  $sql .= " AND bl.fk_product =".((int) $this->id);
2730 
2731  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
2732  if ($result) {
2733  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
2734  $this->stats_bom['nb_toconsume'] = !empty($obj->nb_toconsume) ? $obj->nb_toconsume : 0;
2735  $this->stats_bom['qty_toconsume'] = !empty($obj->qty_toconsume) ? price2num($obj->qty_toconsume) : 0;
2736  } else {
2737  $this->error = $this->db->error();
2738  $error++;
2739  }
2740 
2741  if (!empty($error)) {
2742  return -1;
2743  }
2744 
2745  $parameters = array('socid' => $socid);
2746  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('loadStatsCustomerMO', $parameters, $this, $action);
2747  if ($reshook > 0) {
2748  $this->stats_bom = $hookmanager->resArray['stats_bom'];
2749  }

2754  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
2761  public function load_stats_propale($socid = 0)
2762  {
2763  // phpcs:enable
2764  global $conf, $user, $hookmanager;
2765 
2766  $sql = "SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.fk_soc) as nb_customers, COUNT(DISTINCT p.rowid) as nb,";
2767  $sql .= " COUNT(pd.rowid) as nb_rows, SUM(pd.qty) as qty";
2768  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."propaldet as pd";
2769  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."propal as p";
2770  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s";
2771  if (empty($user->rights->societe->client->voir) && !$socid) {
2772  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe_commerciaux as sc";
2773  }
2774  $sql .= " WHERE p.rowid = pd.fk_propal";
2775  $sql .= " AND p.fk_soc = s.rowid";
2776  $sql .= " AND p.entity IN (".getEntity('propal').")";
2777  $sql .= " AND pd.fk_product = ".((int) $this->id);
2778  if (empty($user->rights->societe->client->voir) && !$socid) {
2779  $sql .= " AND p.fk_soc = sc.fk_soc AND sc.fk_user = ".((int) $user->id);
2780  }
2781  //$sql.= " AND pr.fk_statut != 0";
2782  if ($socid > 0) {
2783  $sql .= " AND p.fk_soc = ".((int) $socid);
2784  }
2785 
2786  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
2787  if ($result) {
2788  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
2789  $this->stats_propale['customers'] = $obj->nb_customers;
2790  $this->stats_propale['nb'] = $obj->nb;
2791  $this->stats_propale['rows'] = $obj->nb_rows;
2792  $this->stats_propale['qty'] = $obj->qty ? $obj->qty : 0;
2793 
2794  // if it's a virtual product, maybe it is in proposal by extension
2795  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_STATS_WITH_PARENT_PROD_IF_INCDEC)) {
2796  $TFather = $this->getFather();
2797  if (is_array($TFather) && !empty($TFather)) {
2798  foreach ($TFather as &$fatherData) {
2799  $pFather = new Product($this->db);
2800  $pFather->id = $fatherData['id'];
2801  $qtyCoef = $fatherData['qty'];
2802 
2803  if ($fatherData['incdec']) {
2804  $pFather->load_stats_propale($socid);
2805 
2806  $this->stats_propale['customers'] += $pFather->stats_propale['customers'];
2807  $this->stats_propale['nb'] += $pFather->stats_propale['nb'];
2808  $this->stats_propale['rows'] += $pFather->stats_propale['rows'];
2809  $this->stats_propale['qty'] += $pFather->stats_propale['qty'] * $qtyCoef;
2810  }
2811  }
2812  }
2813  }
2814 
2815  $parameters = array('socid' => $socid);
2816  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('loadStatsCustomerProposal', $parameters, $this, $action);
2817  if ($reshook > 0) {
2818  $this->stats_propale = $hookmanager->resArray['stats_propale'];
2819  }
2820 
2821  return 1;
2822  } else {
2823  $this->error = $this->db->error();
2824  return -1;
2825  }
2826  }

2892  public function load_stats_commande($socid = 0, $filtrestatut = '', $forVirtualStock = 0)
2893  {
2894  // phpcs:enable
2895  global $conf, $user, $hookmanager;
2896 
2897  $sql = "SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.fk_soc) as nb_customers, COUNT(DISTINCT c.rowid) as nb,";
2898  $sql .= " COUNT(cd.rowid) as nb_rows, SUM(cd.qty) as qty";
2899  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."commandedet as cd";
2900  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."commande as c";
2901  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s";
2902  if (empty($user->rights->societe->client->voir) && !$socid && !$forVirtualStock) {
2903  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe_commerciaux as sc";
2904  }
2905  $sql .= " WHERE c.rowid = cd.fk_commande";
2906  $sql .= " AND c.fk_soc = s.rowid";
2907  $sql .= " AND c.entity IN (".getEntity($forVirtualStock && !empty($conf->global->STOCK_CALCULATE_VIRTUAL_STOCK_TRANSVERSE_MODE) ? 'stock' : 'commande').")";
2908  $sql .= " AND cd.fk_product = ".((int) $this->id);
2909  if (empty($user->rights->societe->client->voir) && !$socid && !$forVirtualStock) {
2910  $sql .= " AND c.fk_soc = sc.fk_soc AND sc.fk_user = ".((int) $user->id);
2911  }
2912  if ($socid > 0) {
2913  $sql .= " AND c.fk_soc = ".((int) $socid);
2914  }
2915  if ($filtrestatut <> '') {
2916  $sql .= " AND c.fk_statut in (".$this->db->sanitize($filtrestatut).")";
2917  }
2918 
2919  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
2920  if ($result) {
2921  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
2922  $this->stats_commande['customers'] = $obj->nb_customers;
2923  $this->stats_commande['nb'] = $obj->nb;
2924  $this->stats_commande['rows'] = $obj->nb_rows;
2925  $this->stats_commande['qty'] = $obj->qty ? $obj->qty : 0;
2926 
2927  // if it's a virtual product, maybe it is in order by extension
2928  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_STATS_WITH_PARENT_PROD_IF_INCDEC)) {
2929  $TFather = $this->getFather();
2930  if (is_array($TFather) && !empty($TFather)) {
2931  foreach ($TFather as &$fatherData) {
2932  $pFather = new Product($this->db);
2933  $pFather->id = $fatherData['id'];
2934  $qtyCoef = $fatherData['qty'];
2935 
2936  if ($fatherData['incdec']) {
2937  $pFather->load_stats_commande($socid, $filtrestatut);
2938 
2939  $this->stats_commande['customers'] += $pFather->stats_commande['customers'];
2940  $this->stats_commande['nb'] += $pFather->stats_commande['nb'];
2941  $this->stats_commande['rows'] += $pFather->stats_commande['rows'];
2942  $this->stats_commande['qty'] += $pFather->stats_commande['qty'] * $qtyCoef;
2943  }
2944  }
2945  }
2946  }
2947 
2948  // If stock decrease is on invoice validation, the theorical stock continue to
2949  // count the orders to ship in theorical stock when some are already removed b invoice validation.
2950  // If option DECREASE_ONLY_UNINVOICEDPRODUCTS is on, we make a compensation.
2951  if (!empty($conf->global->STOCK_CALCULATE_ON_BILL)) {
2952  if (!empty($conf->global->DECREASE_ONLY_UNINVOICEDPRODUCTS)) {
2953  $adeduire = 0;
2954  $sql = "SELECT sum(fd.qty) as count FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."facturedet fd ";
2955  $sql .= " JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."facture f ON fd.fk_facture = f.rowid ";
2956  $sql .= " JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."element_element el ON el.fk_target = f.rowid and el.targettype = 'facture' and sourcetype = 'commande'";
2957  $sql .= " JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."commande c ON el.fk_source = c.rowid ";
2958  $sql .= " WHERE c.fk_statut IN (".$this->db->sanitize($filtrestatut).") AND c.facture = 0 AND fd.fk_product = ".((int) $this->id);
2959  dol_syslog(__METHOD__.":: sql $sql", LOG_NOTICE);
2960 
2961  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
2962  if ($resql) {
2963  if ($this->db->num_rows($resql) > 0) {
2964  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
2965  $adeduire += $obj->count;
2966  }
2967  }
2968 
2969  $this->stats_commande['qty'] -= $adeduire;
2970  }
2971  }
2972 
2973  $parameters = array('socid' => $socid, 'filtrestatut' => $filtrestatut, 'forVirtualStock' => $forVirtualStock);
2974  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('loadStatsCustomerOrder', $parameters, $this, $action);
2975  if ($reshook > 0) {
2976  $this->stats_commande = $hookmanager->resArray['stats_commande'];
2977  }
2978  return 1;
2979  } else {
2980  $this->error = $this->db->error();
2981  return -1;
2982  }
2983  }

3298  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe_commerciaux as sc";
3299  }
3300  $sql .= " WHERE c.rowid = cd.fk_contrat";
3301  $sql .= " AND c.fk_soc = s.rowid";
3302  $sql .= " AND c.entity IN (".getEntity('contract').")";
3303  $sql .= " AND cd.fk_product = ".((int) $this->id);
3304  if (empty($user->rights->societe->client->voir) && !$socid) {
3305  $sql .= " AND c.fk_soc = sc.fk_soc AND sc.fk_user = ".((int) $user->id);
3306  }
3307  //$sql.= " AND c.statut != 0";
3308  if ($socid > 0) {
3309  $sql .= " AND c.fk_soc = ".((int) $socid);
3310  }
3311 
3312  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
3313  if ($result) {
3314  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
3315  $this->stats_contrat['customers'] = $obj->nb_customers;
3316  $this->stats_contrat['nb'] = $obj->nb;
3317  $this->stats_contrat['rows'] = $obj->nb_rows;
3318  $this->stats_contrat['qty'] = $obj->qty ? $obj->qty : 0;
3319 
3320  // if it's a virtual product, maybe it is in contract by extension
3321  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_STATS_WITH_PARENT_PROD_IF_INCDEC)) {
3322  $TFather = $this->getFather();
3323  if (is_array($TFather) && !empty($TFather)) {
3324  foreach ($TFather as &$fatherData) {
3325  $pFather = new Product($this->db);
3326  $pFather->id = $fatherData['id'];
3327  $qtyCoef = $fatherData['qty'];
3328 
3329  if ($fatherData['incdec']) {
3330  $pFather->load_stats_contrat($socid);
3331 
3332  $this->stats_contrat['customers'] += $pFather->stats_contrat['customers'];
3333  $this->stats_contrat['nb'] += $pFather->stats_contrat['nb'];
3334  $this->stats_contrat['rows'] += $pFather->stats_contrat['rows'];
3335  $this->stats_contrat['qty'] += $pFather->stats_contrat['qty'] * $qtyCoef;
3336  }
3337  }
3338  }
3339  }
3340 
3341  $parameters = array('socid' => $socid);
3342  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('loadStatsContract', $parameters, $this, $action);
3343  if ($reshook > 0) {
3344  $this->stats_contrat = $hookmanager->resArray['stats_contrat'];
3345  }
3346 
3347  return 1;
3348  } else {
3349  $this->error = $this->db->error().' sql='.$sql;
3350  return -1;
3351  }
3352  }

3481  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3490  private function _get_stats($sql, $mode, $year = 0)
3491  {
3492  // phpcs:enable
3493  $tab = array();
3494 
3495  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3496  if ($resql) {
3497  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3498  $i = 0;
3499  while ($i < $num) {
3500  $arr = $this->db->fetch_array($resql);
3501  $keyfortab = (string) $arr[1];
3502  if ($year == -1) {
3503  $keyfortab = substr($keyfortab, -2);
3504  }
3505 
3506  if ($mode == 'byunit') {
3507  $tab[$keyfortab] = (empty($tab[$keyfortab]) ? 0 : $tab[$keyfortab]) + $arr[0]; // 1st field
3508  } elseif ($mode == 'bynumber') {
3509  $tab[$keyfortab] = (empty($tab[$keyfortab]) ? 0 : $tab[$keyfortab]) + $arr[2]; // 3rd field
3510  }
3511  $i++;
3512  }
3513  } else {
3514  $this->error = $this->db->error().' sql='.$sql;
3515  return -1;
3516  }
3517 
3518  if (empty($year)) {
3519  $year = strftime('%Y', time());
3520  $month = strftime('%m', time());
3521  } elseif ($year == -1) {
3522  $year = '';
3523  $month = 12; // We imagine we are at end of year, so we get last 12 month before, so all correct year.
3524  } else {
3525  $month = 12; // We imagine we are at end of year, so we get last 12 month before, so all correct year.
3526  }
3527 
3528  $result = array();
3529 
3530  for ($j = 0; $j < 12; $j++) {
3531  // $ids is 'D', 'N', 'O', 'S', ... (First letter of month in user language)
3532  $idx = ucfirst(dol_trunc(dol_print_date(dol_mktime(12, 0, 0, $month, 1, 1970), "%b"), 1, 'right', 'UTF-8', 1));
3533 
3534  //print $idx.'-'.$year.'-'.$month.'<br>';
3535  $result[$j] = array($idx, isset($tab[$year.$month]) ? $tab[$year.$month] : 0);
3536  // $result[$j] = array($monthnum,isset($tab[$year.$month])?$tab[$year.$month]:0);
3537 
3538  $month = "0".($month - 1);
3539  if (dol_strlen($month) == 3) {
3540  $month = substr($month, 1);
3541  }
3542  if ($month == 0) {
3543  $month = 12;
3544  $year = $year - 1;
3545  }
3546  }
3547 
3548  return array_reverse($result);
3549  }

3552  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3563  public function get_nb_vente($socid, $mode, $filteronproducttype = -1, $year = 0, $morefilter = '')
3564  {
3565  // phpcs:enable
3566  global $conf;
3567  global $user;
3568 
3569  $sql = "SELECT sum(d.qty), date_format(f.datef, '%Y%m')";
3570  if ($mode == 'bynumber') {
3571  $sql .= ", count(DISTINCT f.rowid)";
3572  }
3573  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."facturedet as d, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."facture as f, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s";
3574  if ($filteronproducttype >= 0) {
3575  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product as p";
3576  }
3577  if (empty($user->rights->societe->client->voir) && !$socid) {
3578  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe_commerciaux as sc";
3579  }
3580  $sql .= " WHERE f.rowid = d.fk_facture";
3581  if ($this->id > 0) {
3582  $sql .= " AND d.fk_product = ".((int) $this->id);
3583  } else {
3584  $sql .= " AND d.fk_product > 0";
3585  }
3586  if ($filteronproducttype >= 0) {
3587  $sql .= " AND p.rowid = d.fk_product AND p.fk_product_type = ".((int) $filteronproducttype);
3588  }
3589  $sql .= " AND f.fk_soc = s.rowid";
3590  $sql .= " AND f.entity IN (".getEntity('invoice').")";
3591  if (empty($user->rights->societe->client->voir) && !$socid) {
3592  $sql .= " AND f.fk_soc = sc.fk_soc AND sc.fk_user = ".((int) $user->id);
3593  }
3594  if ($socid > 0) {
3595  $sql .= " AND f.fk_soc = $socid";
3596  }
3597  $sql .= $morefilter;
3598  $sql .= " GROUP BY date_format(f.datef,'%Y%m')";
3599  $sql .= " ORDER BY date_format(f.datef,'%Y%m') DESC";
3600 
3601  return $this->_get_stats($sql, $mode, $year);
3602  }

4426  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
4439  public function fetch_prod_arbo($prod, $compl_path = '', $multiply = 1, $level = 1, $id_parent = 0, $ignore_stock_load = 0)
4440  {
4441  // phpcs:enable
4442  global $conf, $langs;
4443 
4444  $tmpproduct = null;
4445  //var_dump($prod);
4446  foreach ($prod as $id_product => $desc_pere) { // $id_product is 0 (first call starting with root top) or an id of a sub_product
4447  if (is_array($desc_pere)) { // If desc_pere is an array, this means it's a child
4448  $id = (!empty($desc_pere[0]) ? $desc_pere[0] : '');
4449  $nb = (!empty($desc_pere[1]) ? $desc_pere[1] : '');
4450  $type = (!empty($desc_pere[2]) ? $desc_pere[2] : '');
4451  $label = (!empty($desc_pere[3]) ? $desc_pere[3] : '');
4452  $incdec = (!empty($desc_pere[4]) ? $desc_pere[4] : 0);
4453 
4454  if ($multiply < 1) {
4455  $multiply = 1;
4456  }
4457 
4458  //print "XXX We add id=".$id." - label=".$label." - nb=".$nb." - multiply=".$multiply." fullpath=".$compl_path.$label."\n";
4459  if (is_null($tmpproduct)) {
4460  $tmpproduct = new Product($this->db); // So we initialize tmpproduct only once for all loop.
4461  }
4462  $tmpproduct->fetch($id); // Load product to get ->ref
4463 
4464  if (empty($ignore_stock_load) && ($tmpproduct->isProduct() || !empty($conf->global->STOCK_SUPPORTS_SERVICES))) {
4465  $tmpproduct->load_stock('nobatch,novirtual'); // Load stock to get true ->stock_reel
4466  }
4467 
4468  $this->res[] = array(
4469  'id'=>$id, // Id product
4470  'id_parent'=>$id_parent,
4471  'ref'=>$tmpproduct->ref, // Ref product
4472  'nb'=>$nb, // Nb of units that compose parent product
4473  'nb_total'=>$nb * $multiply, // Nb of units for all nb of product
4474  'stock'=>$tmpproduct->stock_reel, // Stock
4475  'stock_alert'=>$tmpproduct->seuil_stock_alerte, // Stock alert
4476  'label'=>$label,
4477  'fullpath'=>$compl_path.$label, // Label
4478  'type'=>$type, // Nb of units that compose parent product
4479  'desiredstock'=>$tmpproduct->desiredstock,
4480  'level'=>$level,
4481  'incdec'=>$incdec,
4482  'entity'=>$tmpproduct->entity
4483  );
4484 
4485  // Recursive call if there is childs to child
4486  if (is_array($desc_pere['childs'])) {
4487  //print 'YYY We go down for '.$desc_pere[3]." -> \n";
4488  $this->fetch_prod_arbo($desc_pere['childs'], $compl_path.$desc_pere[3]." -> ", $desc_pere[1] * $multiply, $level + 1, $id, $ignore_stock_load);
4489  }
4490  }
4491  }
4492  }

4546  return -1;

4648  public function getChildsArbo($id, $firstlevelonly = 0, $level = 1)
4649  {
4650  global $alreadyfound;
4651 
4652  if (empty($id)) {
4653  return array();
4654  }
4655 
4656  $sql = "SELECT p.rowid, p.ref, p.label as label, p.fk_product_type,";
4657  $sql .= " pa.qty as qty, pa.fk_product_fils as id, pa.incdec";
4658  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product as p,";
4659  $sql .= " ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_association as pa";
4660  $sql .= " WHERE p.rowid = pa.fk_product_fils";
4661  $sql .= " AND pa.fk_product_pere = ".((int) $id);
4662  $sql .= " AND pa.fk_product_fils <> ".((int) $id); // This should not happens, it is to avoid infinite loop if it happens
4663 
4664  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::getChildsArbo id='.$id.' level='.$level, LOG_DEBUG);
4665 
4666  if ($level == 1) {
4667  $alreadyfound = array($id=>1); // We init array of found object to start of tree, so if we found it later (should not happened), we stop immediatly
4668  }
4669  // Protection against infinite loop
4670  if ($level > 30) {
4671  return array();
4672  }
4673 
4674  $res = $this->db->query($sql);
4675  if ($res) {
4676  $prods = array();
4677  while ($rec = $this->db->fetch_array($res)) {
4678  if (!empty($alreadyfound[$rec['rowid']])) {
4679  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::getChildsArbo the product id='.$rec['rowid'].' was already found at a higher level in tree. We discard to avoid infinite loop', LOG_WARNING);
4680  continue;
4681  }
4682  $alreadyfound[$rec['rowid']] = 1;
4683  $prods[$rec['rowid']] = array(
4684  0=>$rec['rowid'],
4685  1=>$rec['qty'],
4686  2=>$rec['fk_product_type'],
4687  3=>$this->db->escape($rec['label']),
4688  4=>$rec['incdec'],
4689  5=>$rec['ref']
4690  );
4691  //$prods[$this->db->escape($rec['label'])]= array(0=>$rec['id'],1=>$rec['qty'],2=>$rec['fk_product_type']);
4692  //$prods[$this->db->escape($rec['label'])]= array(0=>$rec['id'],1=>$rec['qty']);
4693  if (empty($firstlevelonly)) {
4694  $listofchilds = $this->getChildsArbo($rec['rowid'], 0, $level + 1);
4695  foreach ($listofchilds as $keyChild => $valueChild) {
4696  $prods[$rec['rowid']]['childs'][$keyChild] = $valueChild;
4697  }
4698  }
4699  }
4700 
4701  return $prods;
4702  } else {
4703  dol_print_error($this->db);
4704  return -1;
4705  }
4706  }

4708  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
4715  public function get_sousproduits_arbo()
4716  {
4717  // phpcs:enable
4718  $parent = array();
4719 
4720  foreach ($this->getChildsArbo($this->id) as $keyChild => $valueChild) { // Warning. getChildsArbo can call getChildsArbo recursively. Starting point is $value[0]=id of product
4721  $parent[$this->label][$keyChild] = $valueChild;
4722  }
4723  foreach ($parent as $key => $value) { // key=label, value is array of childs
4724  $this->sousprods[$key] = $value;
4725  }
4726  }

4948  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
4957  public function LibStatut($status, $mode = 0, $type = 0)
4958  {
4959  // phpcs:enable
4960  global $conf, $langs;
4961 
4962  $labelStatus = $labelStatusShort = '';
4963 
4964  $langs->load('products');
4965  if (!empty($conf->productbatch->enabled)) {
4966  $langs->load("productbatch");
4967  }
4968 
4969  if ($type == 2) {
4970  switch ($mode) {
4971  case 0:
4972  $label = ($status == 0 ? $langs->trans('ProductStatusNotOnBatch') : ($status == 1 ? $langs->trans('ProductStatusOnBatch') : $langs->trans('ProductStatusOnSerial')));
4973  return dolGetStatus($label);
4974  case 1:
4975  $label = ($status == 0 ? $langs->trans('ProductStatusNotOnBatchShort') : ($status == 1 ? $langs->trans('ProductStatusOnBatchShort') : $langs->trans('ProductStatusOnSerialShort')));
4976  return dolGetStatus($label);
4977  case 2:
4978  return $this->LibStatut($status, 3, 2).' '.$this->LibStatut($status, 1, 2);
4979  case 3:
4980  return dolGetStatus($langs->trans('ProductStatusNotOnBatch'), '', '', empty($status) ? 'status5' : 'status4', 3, 'dot');
4981  case 4:
4982  return $this->LibStatut($status, 3, 2).' '.$this->LibStatut($status, 0, 2);
4983  case 5:
4984  return $this->LibStatut($status, 1, 2).' '.$this->LibStatut($status, 3, 2);
4985  default:
4986  return dolGetStatus($langs->trans('Unknown'));
4987  }
4988  }
4989 
4990  $statuttrans = empty($status) ? 'status5' : 'status4';
4991 
4992  if ($status == 0) {
4993  // $type 0=Status "to sell", 1=Status "to buy", 2=Status "to Batch"
4994  if ($type == 0) {
4995  $labelStatus = $langs->trans('ProductStatusNotOnSellShort');
4996  $labelStatusShort = $langs->trans('ProductStatusNotOnSell');
4997  } elseif ($type == 1) {
4998  $labelStatus = $langs->trans('ProductStatusNotOnBuyShort');
4999  $labelStatusShort = $langs->trans('ProductStatusNotOnBuy');
5000  } elseif ($type == 2) {
5001  $labelStatus = $langs->trans('ProductStatusNotOnBatch');
5002  $labelStatusShort = $langs->trans('ProductStatusNotOnBatchShort');
5003  }
5004  } elseif ($status == 1) {
5005  // $type 0=Status "to sell", 1=Status "to buy", 2=Status "to Batch"
5006  if ($type == 0) {
5007  $labelStatus = $langs->trans('ProductStatusOnSellShort');
5008  $labelStatusShort = $langs->trans('ProductStatusOnSell');
5009  } elseif ($type == 1) {
5010  $labelStatus = $langs->trans('ProductStatusOnBuyShort');
5011  $labelStatusShort = $langs->trans('ProductStatusOnBuy');
5012  } elseif ($type == 2) {
5013  $labelStatus = ($status == 1 ? $langs->trans('ProductStatusOnBatch') : $langs->trans('ProductStatusOnSerial'));
5014  $labelStatusShort = ($status == 1 ? $langs->trans('ProductStatusOnBatchShort') : $langs->trans('ProductStatusOnSerialShort'));
5015  }
5016  } elseif ( $type == 2 && $status == 2 ) {
5017  $labelStatus = $langs->trans('ProductStatusOnSerial');
5018  $labelStatusShort = $langs->trans('ProductStatusOnSerialShort');
5019  }
5020 
5021  if ($mode > 6) {
5022  return dolGetStatus($langs->trans('Unknown'), '', '', 'status0', 0);
5023  } else {
5024  return dolGetStatus($labelStatus, $labelStatusShort, '', $statuttrans, $mode);
5025  }
5026  }

5149  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5161  public function load_stock($option = '', $includedraftpoforvirtual = null)
5162  {
5163  // phpcs:enable
5164  global $conf;
5165 
5166  $this->stock_reel = 0;
5167  $this->stock_warehouse = array();
5168  $this->stock_theorique = 0;
5169 
5170  // Set filter on warehouse status
5171  $warehouseStatus = array();
5172  if (preg_match('/warehouseclosed/', $option)) {
5173  $warehouseStatus[Entrepot::STATUS_CLOSED] = Entrepot::STATUS_CLOSED;
5174  }
5175  if (preg_match('/warehouseopen/', $option)) {
5176  $warehouseStatus[Entrepot::STATUS_OPEN_ALL] = Entrepot::STATUS_OPEN_ALL;
5177  }
5178  if (preg_match('/warehouseinternal/', $option)) {
5179  if (!empty($conf->global->ENTREPOT_EXTRA_STATUS)) {
5180  $warehouseStatus[Entrepot::STATUS_OPEN_INTERNAL] = Entrepot::STATUS_OPEN_INTERNAL;
5181  } else {
5182  $warehouseStatus[Entrepot::STATUS_OPEN_ALL] = Entrepot::STATUS_OPEN_ALL;
5183  }
5184  }
5185 
5186  $sql = "SELECT ps.rowid, ps.reel, ps.fk_entrepot";
5187  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_stock as ps";
5188  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."entrepot as w";
5189  $sql .= " WHERE w.entity IN (".getEntity('stock').")";
5190  $sql .= " AND w.rowid = ps.fk_entrepot";
5191  $sql .= " AND ps.fk_product = ".((int) $this->id);
5192  if (count($warehouseStatus)) {
5193  $sql .= " AND w.statut IN (".$this->db->sanitize(implode(',', $warehouseStatus)).")";
5194  }
5195 
5196  $sql .= " ORDER BY ps.reel ".(!empty($conf->global->DO_NOT_TRY_TO_DEFRAGMENT_STOCKS_WAREHOUSE)?'DESC':'ASC'); // Note : qty ASC is important for expedition card, to avoid stock fragmentation;
5197 
5198  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::load_stock", LOG_DEBUG);
5199  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
5200  if ($result) {
5201  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
5202  $i = 0;
5203  if ($num > 0) {
5204  while ($i < $num) {
5205  $row = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
5206  $this->stock_warehouse[$row->fk_entrepot] = new stdClass();
5207  $this->stock_warehouse[$row->fk_entrepot]->real = $row->reel;
5208  $this->stock_warehouse[$row->fk_entrepot]->id = $row->rowid;
5209  if ((!preg_match('/nobatch/', $option)) && $this->hasbatch()) {
5210  $this->stock_warehouse[$row->fk_entrepot]->detail_batch = Productbatch::findAll($this->db, $row->rowid, 1, $this->id);
5211  }
5212  $this->stock_reel += $row->reel;
5213  $i++;
5214  }
5215  }
5216  $this->db->free($result);
5217 
5218  if (!preg_match('/novirtual/', $option)) {
5219  $this->load_virtual_stock($includedraftpoforvirtual); // This also load all arrays stats_xxx...
5220  }
5221 
5222  return 1;
5223  } else {
5224  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
5225  return -1;
5226  }
5227  }

5230  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5239  public function load_virtual_stock($includedraftpoforvirtual = null)
5240  {
5241  // phpcs:enable
5242  global $conf, $hookmanager, $action;
5243 
5244  $stock_commande_client = 0;
5245  $stock_commande_fournisseur = 0;
5246  $stock_sending_client = 0;
5247  $stock_reception_fournisseur = 0;
5248  $stock_inproduction = 0;
5249 
5250  //dol_syslog("load_virtual_stock");
5251 
5252  if (!empty($conf->commande->enabled)) {
5253  $result = $this->load_stats_commande(0, '1,2', 1);
5254  if ($result < 0) {
5255  dol_print_error($this->db, $this->error);
5256  }
5257  $stock_commande_client = $this->stats_commande['qty'];
5258  }
5259  if (!empty($conf->expedition->enabled)) {
5260  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/expedition/class/expedition.class.php';
5261  $filterShipmentStatus = '';
5262  if (!empty($conf->global->STOCK_CALCULATE_ON_SHIPMENT)) {
5263  $filterShipmentStatus = Expedition::STATUS_VALIDATED.','.Expedition::STATUS_CLOSED;
5264  } elseif (!empty($conf->global->STOCK_CALCULATE_ON_SHIPMENT_CLOSE)) {
5265  $filterShipmentStatus = Expedition::STATUS_CLOSED;
5266  }
5267  $result = $this->load_stats_sending(0, '1,2', 1, $filterShipmentStatus);
5268  if ($result < 0) {
5269  dol_print_error($this->db, $this->error);
5270  }
5271  $stock_sending_client = $this->stats_expedition['qty'];
5272  }
5273  if ((!empty($conf->fournisseur->enabled) && empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_NEW_SUPPLIERMOD)) || !empty($conf->supplier_order->enabled)) {
5274  $filterStatus = empty($conf->global->SUPPLIER_ORDER_STATUS_FOR_VIRTUAL_STOCK) ? '3,4' : $conf->global->SUPPLIER_ORDER_STATUS_FOR_VIRTUAL_STOCK;
5275  if (isset($includedraftpoforvirtual)) {
5276  $filterStatus = '0,1,2,'.$filterStatus; // 1,2 may have already been inside $filterStatus but it is better to have twice than missing $filterStatus does not include them
5277  }
5278  $result = $this->load_stats_commande_fournisseur(0, $filterStatus, 1);
5279  if ($result < 0) {
5280  dol_print_error($this->db, $this->error);
5281  }
5282  $stock_commande_fournisseur = $this->stats_commande_fournisseur['qty'];
5283  }
5284  if (((!empty($conf->fournisseur->enabled) && empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_NEW_SUPPLIERMOD)) || !empty($conf->supplier_order->enabled) || !empty($conf->supplier_invoice->enabled)) && !empty($conf->reception->enabled)) {
5285  $filterStatus = '4';
5286  if (isset($includedraftpoforvirtual)) {
5287  $filterStatus = '0,'.$filterStatus;
5288  }
5289  $result = $this->load_stats_reception(0, $filterStatus, 1); // Use same tables than when module reception is not used.
5290  if ($result < 0) {
5291  dol_print_error($this->db, $this->error);
5292  }
5293  $stock_reception_fournisseur = $this->stats_reception['qty'];
5294  }
5295  if (!empty($conf->mrp->enabled)) {
5296  $result = $this->load_stats_inproduction(0, '1,2', 1);
5297  if ($result < 0) {
5298  dol_print_error($this->db, $this->error);
5299  }
5300  $stock_inproduction = $this->stats_mrptoproduce['qty'] - $this->stats_mrptoconsume['qty'];
5301  }
5302 
5303  $this->stock_theorique = $this->stock_reel + $stock_inproduction;
5304 
5305  // Stock decrease mode
5306  if (!empty($conf->global->STOCK_CALCULATE_ON_SHIPMENT) || !empty($conf->global->STOCK_CALCULATE_ON_SHIPMENT_CLOSE)) {
5307  $this->stock_theorique -= ($stock_commande_client - $stock_sending_client);
5308  } elseif (!empty($conf->global->STOCK_CALCULATE_ON_VALIDATE_ORDER)) {
5309  $this->stock_theorique += 0;
5310  } elseif (!empty($conf->global->STOCK_CALCULATE_ON_BILL)) {
5311  $this->stock_theorique -= $stock_commande_client;
5312  }
5313  // Stock Increase mode
5314  if (!empty($conf->global->STOCK_CALCULATE_ON_RECEPTION) || !empty($conf->global->STOCK_CALCULATE_ON_RECEPTION_CLOSE)) {
5315  $this->stock_theorique += ($stock_commande_fournisseur - $stock_reception_fournisseur);
5316  } elseif (!empty($conf->global->STOCK_CALCULATE_ON_SUPPLIER_DISPATCH_ORDER)) {
5317  $this->stock_theorique += ($stock_commande_fournisseur - $stock_reception_fournisseur);
5318  } elseif (!empty($conf->global->STOCK_CALCULATE_ON_SUPPLIER_VALIDATE_ORDER)) {
5319  $this->stock_theorique -= $stock_reception_fournisseur;
5320  } elseif (!empty($conf->global->STOCK_CALCULATE_ON_SUPPLIER_BILL)) {
5321  $this->stock_theorique += ($stock_commande_fournisseur - $stock_reception_fournisseur);
5322  }
5323 
5324  if (!is_object($hookmanager)) {
5325  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/hookmanager.class.php';
5326  $hookmanager = new HookManager($this->db);
5327  }
5328  $hookmanager->initHooks(array('productdao'));
5329  $parameters = array('id'=>$this->id, 'includedraftpoforvirtual' => $includedraftpoforvirtual);
5330  // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
5331  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('loadvirtualstock', $parameters, $this, $action);
5332  if ($reshook > 0) {
5333  $this->stock_theorique = $hookmanager->resArray['stock_theorique'];
5334  }
5335 
5336  return 1;
5337  }

5352  $sql .= " WHERE pb.fk_product_stock = ps.rowid AND ps.fk_product = ".((int) $this->id)." AND pb.batch = '".$this->db->escape($batch)."'";
5353  $sql .= " GROUP BY pb.batch, pb.eatby, pb.sellby";

5360  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
5361  $result[] = array('batch'=>$batch, 'eatby'=>$this->db->jdate($obj->eatby), 'sellby'=>$this->db->jdate($obj->sellby), 'qty'=>$obj->qty);
5362  $i++;
5363  }
5364  return $result;

5367  $this->db->rollback();

5468  public function liste_photos($dir, $nbmax = 0)
5469  {
5470  // phpcs:enable
5471  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/files.lib.php';
5472  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/images.lib.php';

5477  $dir_osencoded = dol_osencode($dir);
5478  $handle = @opendir($dir_osencoded);
5479  if (is_resource($handle)) {
5480  while (($file = readdir($handle)) !== false) {
5481  if (!utf8_check($file)) {
5482  $file = utf8_encode($file); // readdir returns ISO
5483  }
5484  if (dol_is_file($dir.$file) && image_format_supported($file) >= 0) {
5485  $nbphoto++;
5486 
5487  // We forge name of thumb.
5488  $photo = $file;
5489  $photo_vignette = '';
5490  $regs = array();
5491  if (preg_match('/('.$this->regeximgext.')$/i', $photo, $regs)) {
5492  $photo_vignette = preg_replace('/'.$regs[0].'/i', '', $photo).'_small'.$regs[0];

5496

5502  } else {
5503  $obj['photo_vignette'] = "";
5504  }
5505 
5506  $tabobj[$nbphoto - 1] = $obj;
5507 
5508  // Do we have to continue with next photo ?
5509  if ($nbmax && $nbphoto >= $nbmax) {
5510  break;
5511  }
5512  }
5513  }
5514 
5515  closedir($handle);
5516  }

5518  return $tabobj;

5718  public function getLabelOfUnit($type = 'long')
5719  {
5720  global $langs;
5721 
5722  if (!$this->fk_unit) {
5723  return '';
5724  }
5725 
5726  $langs->load('products');
5727 
5728  $label_type = 'label';
5729  if ($type == 'short') {
5730  $label_type = 'short_label';
5731  }
5732 
5733  $sql = 'select '.$label_type.', code from '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_units where rowid='.$this->fk_unit;
5734  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
5735  if ($resql && $this->db->num_rows($resql) > 0) {
5736  $res = $this->db->fetch_array($resql);
5737  $label = ($label_type == 'short_label' ? $res[$label_type] : 'unit'.$res['code']);
5738  $this->db->free($resql);
5739  return $label;
5740  } else {
5741  $this->error = $this->db->error().' sql='.$sql;
5742  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::getLabelOfUnit Error ".$this->error, LOG_ERR);
5743  return -1;
5744  }
5745  }

5764  public function min_recommended_price()

5771  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_MINIMUM_RECOMMENDED_PRICE)) {

5775

5778  if ($productfourn->fourn_unitprice > $maxpricesupplier) {
5779  $maxpricesupplier = $productfourn->fourn_unitprice;
5780  }
5781  }
5782 
5783  $maxpricesupplier *= $conf->global->PRODUCT_MINIMUM_RECOMMENDED_PRICE;
5784  }
5785  }

5837  public function generateMultiprices(User $user, $baseprice, $price_type, $price_vat, $npr, $psq)
5838  {
5839  global $conf, $db;
5840 
5841  $sql = "SELECT rowid, level, fk_level, var_percent, var_min_percent FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_pricerules";
5842  $query = $this->db->query($sql);
5843 
5844  $rules = array();
5845 
5846  while ($result = $this->db->fetch_object($query)) {
5847  $rules[$result->level] = $result;
5848  }
5849 
5850  //Because prices can be based on other level's prices, we temporarily store them
5851  $prices = array(
5852  1 => $baseprice
5853  );
5854 
5855  for ($i = 1; $i <= $conf->global->PRODUIT_MULTIPRICES_LIMIT; $i++) {
5856  $price = $baseprice;
5857  $price_min = $baseprice;
5858 
5859  //We have to make sure it does exist and it is > 0
5860  //First price level only allows changing min_price
5861  if ($i > 1 && isset($rules[$i]->var_percent) && $rules[$i]->var_percent) {
5862  $price = $prices[$rules[$i]->fk_level] * (1 + ($rules[$i]->var_percent / 100));
5863  }
5864 
5865  $prices[$i] = $price;
5866 
5867  //We have to make sure it does exist and it is > 0
5868  if (isset($rules[$i]->var_min_percent) && $rules[$i]->var_min_percent) {
5869  $price_min = $price * (1 - ($rules[$i]->var_min_percent / 100));
5870  }
5871 
5872  //Little check to make sure the price is modified before triggering generation
5873  $check_amount = (($price == $this->multiprices[$i]) && ($price_min == $this->multiprices_min[$i]));
5874  $check_type = ($baseprice == $this->multiprices_base_type[$i]);
5875 
5876  if ($check_amount && $check_type) {
5877  continue;
5878  }
5879 
5880  if ($this->updatePrice($price, $price_type, $user, $price_vat, $price_min, $i, $npr, $psq, true) < 0) {
5881  return -1;
5882  }
5883  }
5884 
5885  return 1;
5886  }

5910  public function info($id)
5911  {
5912  $sql = "SELECT p.rowid, p.ref, p.datec as date_creation, p.tms as date_modification,";
5913  $sql .= " p.fk_user_author, p.fk_user_modif";
5914  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$this->table_element." as p";
5915  $sql .= " WHERE p.rowid = ".((int) $id);
5916 
5917  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
5918  if ($result) {
5919  if ($this->db->num_rows($result)) {
5920  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
5921 
5922  $this->id = $obj->rowid;
5923 
5924  if ($obj->fk_user_author) {
5925  $cuser = new User($this->db);
5926  $cuser->fetch($obj->fk_user_author);
5927  $this->user_creation = $cuser;
5928  }
5929 
5930  if ($obj->fk_user_modif) {
5931  $muser = new User($this->db);
5932  $muser->fetch($obj->fk_user_modif);
5933  $this->user_modification = $muser;
5934  }
5935 
5936  $this->ref = $obj->ref;
5937  $this->date_creation = $this->db->jdate($obj->date_creation);
5938  $this->date_modification = $this->db->jdate($obj->date_modification);
5939  }
5940 
5941  $this->db->free($result);
5942  } else {
5943  dol_print_error($this->db);
5944  }
5945  }
5946 }
